home.title: Upcoming Presidential Election!
home.description: Your voice matters. Make sure to cast your vote and shape the future.
home.defaultIntro: We are pleased to announce that the next presidential election will be held soon. This is your opportunity to choose the leader who will best represent your interests. Prepare to learn about the candidates and make an informed decision.
admin.login.title: Admin Access
admin.login.description: Enter the password to access the admin section.
